loan.name: Nancy
loan.use: to purchase farm inputs and dairy feeds, a salon drier, and chairs and tables for her hotel.
loan.description:
Nancy is 24 years old. She is married and blessed with two children. She has been practicing mixed farming. She operates a hotel and a salon which doubles her monthly income. She has had all her businesses for five years, earning a monthly income of KES. 40,000.

She is applying for her first loan to boost her income. She will be using it to purchase farm manure and dairy feeds, a salon drier, and chairs and tables for her hotel [restaurant].

With the anticipated profit, she will be able to educate and pay her children's school fees.

Her hopes and dreams are to succeed in business and have her family stable.
loan.whySpecial: It provides financial services and education in deep rural areas.
